You're stuck in the HTTP fetcher.  We've seen issues fetching https in 
old versions but haven't seen it happening in 1.2.0 as yet (Below do not 
seem to be https URLs).

Get a stack trace Tom.  You do this by sending a SIGQUIT to the 
launching process:

% kill -SIGQUIT PID

The stack trace should show in the tail of heritrix_out.log.

If you're on jdk1.5.0, you can use the jstack tool instead and do:

% JAVA_HOME/bin/jstack PID

These should give you better detail on where we're actually stuck.

Send it over here Tom.  We'd like to take a look, especially since its 
in HEAD.

St.Ack
